title: Do I get banned if someone assumed I scripted?
body:
Gizmundo, reported me 2 times for scripting in game as lux and veigar but he has no evidence. But i dont script. He started accusing me for scripting in game in one for all. Riot u can check my match history and replays. Do i look like a scripter to you?
He flamed at me and said enjoy the ban. Do I get banned if someone assume i scripted but i didnt?

replies.body:
nothing to hide, nothing to fear

no worries, people get reported all the time for things they didn't do.

Your actual actions speak for themselves.

but if you do get banned, send a support ticket to Riot to clarify.

They will investigate and if you were (they can tell) you will be banned.  If not then nope.


SCripting is a real issue right now in league and I report anyone I suspect is scripting and let Riot look into it.

If they werent they will know and nothing bad will happen to the player (gg for them) but if they were well by by account for them.

Anyone can report you for anything they want and absolutely nothing will happen without proof.

Trash tends to blame anything that beats them on cheating/hacking/bugs/lag ect.
He can call you a scripter, he can report you for scripting, but unless you're actually scripting you're fine.

If you weren't actually scripting you'll be fine. Trust me, people blame me for scripting with kog'maw's Ult all the time. (Especially when we had urf. I shot it so much I got called a scripter every other game.)
######Rip URF.
